messages.body: $NVDA $AAPL 'We're trusting the bounce': PNC Financial says it's too early to turn bearish on stocks https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/13/were-trusting-the-bounce-pnc-says-its-too-early-to-turn-bearish.html

links.title: 'We're trusting the bounce': PNC Financial says it's too early to turn bearish on stocks
links.description: PNC Financial's Amanda Agati isn't ready to enter the bear camp despite a tumultuous week on Wall Street. Agati, who is the firm's co-chief investment strategist, believes a strong earnings season will revive the markets and boost confidence among investors. "We're trusting the bounce.

links.title: October 2018 - Stock Market Conditions
links.description: Current Market Conditions/Emotions I wanted to take a moment to address the current market conditions and offer up some advice. links.title: Here's why the market's 'Octoberphobia' selling could soon give way to a new rally
